post.text: Very proud of Donald Trump Jr. last night!

comment.author: Shenae
comment.text: what exactly is what Donald Trump is planning to make America great again? I mean, so far all I hear is "we'll make America great again", "we're building a wall".. but not actual plans.. I am not a supporter of Trump, but maybe if I saw actual plans and proposes I may change my mind.. I don't know, just saying..

replies.author: Ashlynn
replies.text: Go to Donald J. Trump's website.....he outlines what his plans are in detail....

replies.author: Colleen
replies.text: He has no plans what on earth are you talking about

replies.author: Justin
replies.text: Actions speak louder than words.....I mean you can look at his records/results as a businessman/GOP nominee now and his kids though.....

replies.author: Samantha
replies.text: I can't wait for him to be the next President of the United States of America!! You will see his plans then!!

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: Job creation and bringing our companies back to America
